name: Hungry Peter
description:
Peter is very hungry. Suddenly, he sees a table full of food. What does Peter do? He jumps right onto it!

Help Peter eat as much food as possible. But be aware - not everything what's on the table is edible! 
Beat your high score, collect money for upgrades, feed the Peter - this game has it ALL!

You think you've beaten Hungry Peter and there's nothing to do? Think again! With prestige the fun is endless!

Features:
- Online ranking!
- Many tables to explore (and many more to come)!
- Power-ups! These are real game changers.
- Many upgradable items in shop!
- Real eating sounds!
- Endless food eating!

What are you waiting for? Try it out for yourself!
